sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM QNA_BOARD WHERE MEM_EMAIL LIKE '%'||#mem_Email#||'%'
SELECT * FROM Free_Like_Count_View WHERE MEM_EMAIL like '%'||#mem_Email#||'%'
SELECT * FROM Skill_Like_Count_View WHERE MEM_EMAIL like '%'||#mem_Email#||'%'
SELECT * FROM VW_MYPOST WHERE MAIL like '%'||#mail#||'%' ORDER BY DT DESC
